title: Looking for Serious/Intense Players.
body:
So I'm a mid lane main and decent jgl. 
I don't mind playing and climbing alone but my irl personality has friends and we do most things together and in league I think I fall behind on that. I play with some people but (saying this as nice as possible and I mean no rudeness) they're usually not as good and still learning or just in a higher elo and when I talk to higher elos 1/10 of them are nice. 
So the MAIN thing is - is there anyone out there who wants to get better at the game and wants to play with other people. 
(Serious gameplay) 
I'm only silver right now but I'd enjoy it if you'd like to try hard in ranked games like : shotcalling, big plays and synergy.
Looking for a serious duo or more :)

replies.body:
I have a current team in my discord looking for a mid laner, feel free to drop by.

https://discord.gg/Y93kJJN
IDM Duoing but i dont like flex queue add me if u want im b3 rn Jg Main , im decent in all other lanes
